subject: Re: For FB users
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
Sorry you had that experience Frank. However, by dumping your Facebook, you're just letting them have the upper hand. Just my thoughts.

Gab

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  For anybody that was on my FB friends--I dumped Fb after yet someone
> else that seemed to be starting the same incessant arguements, how dare I
> disagree! I'm just not doing that again. I can't say anything about the idot
> paranormal/ghost hunter community, can't say how the box works, can't say
> how stupid most people's percerption of spirit is--I'm over it!
> 
> Frank-S
>
